title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.1 - Effective clause
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.1 - Effective clause

State Regulations

Whenever a highway designation is revised or amended by
changes in the vehicle class, termini, length and/or boundary description or by
other changes, the revised or amended sections shall become effective
immediately upon filing with the Secretary of State. The prior regulations
shall remain in force and effect until such time as the new regulation is
filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8000.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
